Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 78 of 236
LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross
1 (Jury present)
2 THE COURT: Thank you, everyone. Thank you, members
3 of the jury.
4 Mr. Pagliuca, you may continue with your cross
5 examination of Mr. Alessi.
6 Mr. Alessi, I remind you, you are under oath.
7 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor.
8 BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
9 Q. Mr. Alessi I want to talk now about you meeting Virginia
10 Roberts. Okay?
11 A. Okay, sir.
12 Q. Do you recall that you met Ms. Roberts for the first time
13 at Mar-a-Lago; correct?
14 A. Yes.
15 Q. And you went, Ms. Maxwell, Ghislaine went into Mar-a-Lago
16 for a treatment.
17 Do you recall that?
18 A. I don't know if she was going to get a treatment, but if
19 that's why she went inside, yes.
20 Q. Let me just ask the question. Do you recall that she went
21 into Mar-a-Lago for some form of treatment?
22 Do you recall that?
23 A. I don't recall that.
24 MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can show the witness 3504-030,
25 page 48, deposition transcript page 190, lines 13 through 25,
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300

text_blocks.content:
(Jury present)
THE COURT: Thank you, everyone. Thank you, members
of the jury.
Mr. Pagliuca, you may continue with your cross
examination of Mr. Alessi.
Mr. Alessi, I remind you, you are under oath.
MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you, your Honor.
BY MR. PAGLIUCA:
Q. Mr. Alessi I want to talk now about you meeting Virginia
Roberts. Okay?
A. Okay, sir.
Q. Do you recall that you met Ms. Roberts for the first time
at Mar-a-Lago; correct?
A. Yes.
Q. And you went, Ms. Maxwell, Ghislaine went into Mar-a-Lago
for a treatment.
Do you recall that?
A. I don't know if she was going to get a treatment, but if
that's why she went inside, yes.
Q. Let me just ask the question. Do you recall that she went
into Mar-a-Lago for some form of treatment?
Do you recall that?
A. I don't recall that.
MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can show the witness 3504-030,
page 48, deposition transcript page 190, lines 13 through 25,

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
